snippet.title: Guns of Icarus Online Cinematic Trailer | Muse Games
snippet.description:
The Cinematic Trailer to Guns of Icarus Online.
Fully funded thanks to Kickstarter, it released in October 2012, and to this day is one of the most downloaded games on Steam.
Today we merged it with our latest game Guns of Icarus Alliance, and serves as a free gateway to the new game for people who bought it prior to its release.


MUSE GAMES
Muse Games, an indiedev studio in New York City. We're a passionate bunch that makes games that we enjoy playing.
➤ More: https://tinyurl.com/musesocial

GUNS OF ICARUS ALLIANCE
Win | Mac | Linux | PS4 
➤ Get the game: https://tinyurl.com/buygoi
➤ @gunsoficarus #gunsoficarus
➤ More: https://tinyurl.com/goisocial

HAMSTERDAM
Nintendo Switch | PS Vita | iOS | Android | Steam
➤ Get the game: https://tinyurl.com/buyhamsterdam
➤ @HamsterdamGame #HamsterdamGame
➤ More: https://tinyurl.com/hamsterdamsocial

CREAVURES
iOS | Steam
➤ Get the game: https://tinyurl.com/buycreavures
